2. I am also in complete agreement with [Aurelien Keller](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/listForContributor?user=2qf6nk6hn4h1o) about his comment on descriptions. This is necessary, and I am too working towards improving tool tip descriptions and component descriptions as and when I spot the ones that I think could be improved.

What I really like is adding what decision the component can help you take in addition what it can help you simulate. Obviously, I draw inspiration from components written by Chris and Sarith. Technical notes, suggested practices, and warnings provided by Sarith are much appreciated.
